name: Space fighter (itch) (AhmedSh4hien)
description:
This game is not completed and probably never will be.

the game has 29 waves and two of them are boss fights. let me know if you reached 29 !

Little info:

There are 4 different weapons , which have a chance of being dropped by an enemy , you cant change the weapon unless you pick it up.

each weapon has 10 firepowers which is constant (colored drop) same thing thing as in chicken invaders.(also firepower increase when you pick up the same weapon as the current one)

also little something happen when you reach fire-power 10 :p

there are rockets which are obtained by picking up coins(25 for 1)

There is a rare chance of having an extra life drop from hitting asteroids.

And thats it have fun.or dont its incomplete anyways.
